864:3: nityānitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 1 ||
864:5: prapitāmahi sattvānāṃ prajñe devi namo'stu te || 2 ||
864:7: manorathaprade śuddhe prajñe devi namo'stu te || 3 ||
864:8: lakṣmīstvamasi kalyāṇi śrīrdhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ |
864:9: sarvasvarūpe sarveśi prajñe devi namo'stu te || 4 ||
864:11: daśa pāramitākāre prajñe devi namo'stu te || 5 ||
